org.springframework.social.yammer.api.impl
Class YammerPostDetails

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.social.yammer.api.impl.YammerPostDetails

public class YammerPostDetails
extends java.lang.Object

Details beyond the message, used when posting to yammer. Differs from YammerMessage which is the type returned when submitting a posting or when polling for messages with any of the get-methods in MessageOperations

Author:
Morten Andersen-Gott
See Also:
YammerMessage
